summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by setting DATA_URL to '/data.json' in frontend/src/services/viralPromptsClient.ts. However, the diff also shows substantial additional changes to prompt parsing/validation and project metadata/docs that were not requested and conflict with the stated non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/changed prompt parsing, sanitization, and validation logic (e.g., sanitizePrompt, parseAndValidatePrompts, detailed diagnostics and error classification) beyond the requested DATA_URL constant update.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly say not to alter prompt parsing/validation logic beyond the URL constant update; diff shows significant new logic unrelated to just changing the constant.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata indicating pending feature request and architectural notes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a one-line constant change in a specific frontend file; modifying project_state.json is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository-wide frontend file summary text describing numerous UI/features and behaviors unrelated to the requested URL constant change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request updating documentation/summary files or adding unrelated feature descriptions.
